author: dkulp
msg: Configure JAX-WS handlers per port per service.
Configure JAX-WS handlers per binding type.
[cxf-1354]Generate @XmlList annotation for a RPC Literal SEI when the wsdl:part type is <xs:list>
Deal with some error handling quirks of Mozilla.
Fix to NPE when an <xs:any> was last.
Get the corba tooling tests all building and passing
Moved restful_jaxrs demo to a new demo directory called jax-rs, this directory will be the place to hold various jax-rs related demos.
Update jax-rs basic demo readme build script etc.
[CXF-1348,CXF-1349]Support marshal and unmarshal xml list type in RPCInInterceptor and RPCOutInterceptor
Added a secure jax-rs demo to show how to use https
Moved these Apache HTTP Client files needed by the demo client to contrib directory.
Correct the port number to fix the build
Update checkstyle roles to avoid checking files under contrib dir
More updates to get closer to having the corba binding working
* Fix the Holder in the generated Wrapper beans
* Use the field name for the getter/setter in the wrapper beans
* Java2Ws generate all the quolified operations
include all the Declared methods in the implclass
* Set the namepace into XmlElement if we can get the targetNamespace from the WebParam
Return to chew on anyType in javascript. Fix the dom-returning current implementation, and set up test materials for something better.
Revised the algorithm used to determine JSR-311 output content types.
Added a new demo to show how to do content negotiation in JSR-311. updated other Jsr-311 demos.
Test case for CXF-1361: Output MIME type did not set correctly when there are multiple values for @ProduceMime
* Add the schemaLocation for the imported schema if the namespace is ws-a
Get another Javascript any-related test to pass.
More fun with anyType. Get better values.
